title: Client going black before champion select?
body:
So basically, when ever I click accept, to join a game, my client will go black, the music will play, but my screen is black, making it really had for me to get positions that i want?

Any help on this? I'm happy to answer any questions that people have

Thanks <3

It does make it significantly better thanks, is there any way that it can be like this with a Wifi connection as opposed to a wired connection?

Your best bet to improve the quality of your wireless connection would be to do the following

* Ensure there are no OR as little as possible obstructions between your system and your router
* Ensure your router is configured to use a channel where there is the least interference in your home (Usually setting this to Auto should be fine)
* Upgrade to a higher quality router, most ISP provided modem/router combos are good enough for most use cases, however can get bogged down by high amounts of traffic.

I still don't recommend using wifi at all over a wired connection.
